value.title: Install and configure Power BI Report Server (May 2017 Preview)
value.excerpt: In this video, I look at how to install and configure the May 2017 Preview of Power BI Report Server. Power BI Report Server has a new standalone install experience and this product allows for Power BI reports to be rendered in the web portal along with paginated reports.  This will get you started with
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/zacaEb9A4F0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Is a parameter filtered in Power BI Paginated Reports???
value.excerpt: How do you know if a parameter was filtered in your Power BI Paginated Reports? Was a slicer used in the Power BI report that is using the Paginated visual? Adam shows you a way you can find out!  Create and use the paginated report visual https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-bi/visuals/paginated-report-visual
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/YU1VjMEOw9Y" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Is Data Wrangler the Power Query of Python?
value.excerpt: Have you tried Data Wrangler within Microsoft Fabric or Visual Studio Code? It's a great way to start cleaning your data and have it write your python code for you! Really getting the Power Query vibes and we love it!  How to accelerate data prep with Data Wrangler in Microsoft Fabric https://learn.microsoft.com/fabric/data-science/data-wrangler

value.title: Is Query Folding happening in Power BI?
value.excerpt: We look at how to tell if query folding is actually happening within Power BI. You may be surprised! Power Query has a few tools for you. value.title: Manage Custom Visual purchases for Power BI
value.excerpt: It used to be a bit of a struggle to purchase a custom visual for more than yourself. Introducing a new way to purchase licensed Power BI visuals and manage licenses

value.title: 'OraOLEDB.Oracle' provider is not registered

value.title: Parameters and Templates with Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick shows a way you can use parameters and templates, with Power BI Desktop, to provide prompts for your connection's server and database properties.   This is great for when you are creating a report, and need to share it with a customer that may have a different name for the server

value.title: Personal Gateway governance in Power BI
value.excerpt: Gateway sprawl in Power BI can be a problem for organizations looking to govern what data can be refreshed. Learn how you can govern the Personal Gateway to keep it under control.  Set-DataGatewayTenantPolicy PowerShell Reference https://docs.microsoft.com/powershell/module/datagateway/set-datagatewaytenantpolicy?view=datagateway-ps

value.title: Power BI and the On-premises Data Gateway: What is it?
value.excerpt: In this video, we look at the On-Premises Data Gateway. What is it exactly? This can be used with more than just Power BI. This includes PowerApps, Microsoft Flow, Azure Analysis Services and more. The entire Power Platform!   If you found this video helpful, we have a free cheat sheet for you for more

value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports: Visualizing Data
value.excerpt: Paginated reports in Power BI are now available. Now that you have data, Patrick walks you through how to build a matrix visual within the report. He also looks at how to work with expressions and formatting.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube --
